review: Look, it's Google. So if there is a way to make this easier or foolproof, Google will do it. Just plug the thing on your TV (remember to buy a usb power cable if your tv is as old as mine), download the app for your phone and turn your tv on. Google will guide you through a 3 step setup to pair your chromecast with your phone and then connect it with your wifi. That's it. Really.You'll spend more time figuring what to do with it other than netflix than with all the setup and installation process.PS: hope you have a strong internet connection cos this little thing will suck your connection dry. If you live in a third world country like me, forget about casting a movie and doing some skype at the same time. You'll have to choose cos your connection will drop on some of them.
